Name: Zoning, 962-972 Franklin Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 230358 ZSK)
Title: Application number C 230358 ZSK (962-972 Franklin Avenue Rezoning) submitted by Franklin Ave Acquisition, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-533 of the Zoning Resolution to reduce the number of required accessory off-street parking spaces for dwelling units in a development within the Transit Zone, that includes at least 20 percent of all dwelling units as income-restricted housing units, in connection with a proposed mixed-use development on property located at 962-972 Franklin Avenue (Block 1192, Lots 63 and 66), in R8A and R8A/C2-4 Districts, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 9, Council District 35.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
